page.title: 05PET FOOD MANUFACTURERS
page.content: {Spillers}Pet Food factory makes dog biscuits called{Bonio}and{Winalot}and we saw how these are made during our visit. The biscuits are made from flour, tallow, molasses and water, with added vitamins and minerals. The factory uses{computers}to measure out these ingredients in the correct amounts and then it is all mixed up in huge revolving containers. It is then pushed between rollers, cut into shapes, and baked in huge ovens. We saw how they packed their biscuits. It is all done by machine with women guiding and checking for any problems. They even have a machine that uses X-rays to look for any metal that may have got in by accident. We were all given a box of Bonio as a free sample when we left.
